author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...NEW TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...NEW TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Two-C was located near 12.0, -143.6 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...NEW TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 5:00 AM HST Mon Jul 28 the center of Two-C was located near 12.0, -143.6 with movement W at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1008 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Two-C (CP2/CP022025)
